channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish outside property not in proper bins! Its all over the pavement so obstructing the pathway and blows about the street, 26th February
item.description:
This property always has rubbish outside not put in proper bins! The refuse collectors wont take it because it is not sorted properly! Its becoming a nuisance and an eyesore!

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Selective parking enforcement, 26th February
item.description:
Ongoing selective parking enforcement in this location. Vehicles parked in a 30-minute short-stay bay for extended periods every day without any enforcement action, while other vehicles in the same bays are issued PCNs and penalised. This inconsistent approach undermines public trust and prevents fair access to short-stay parking for residents, customers, and legitimate users. Please investigate why vehicles is being repeatedly ignored, provide a clear explanation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Plough Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees caucusing problem, 26th February
item.description:
Catkins falling from trees making pavements as mess everything is turning green. We were told a few years ago the trees would be cut back but as usual for the forgotten parade nothing. No tree pruning no street cleaning just green mess
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Beckenham Road, Penge, Greater London
